tokens.text: returns absolute position of an entity

description: Returns the absolute position of an entity. Takes one argument that represents the desired axis (0 == x-axis, 1 == y-axis, 2 == z-axis).

generated_doNotEdit.title: Position
generated_doNotEdit.description: Returns the absolute position of an actor.  Takes one argument that represents the desired axis (0 == x-axis, 1 == y-axis, 2 == z-axis).
